subtitle: Wait for at least 2 years
title: When to have my next baby?
content:
Created by BabyCenter

Header: When to have my next baby?
Sub-header: Wait for at least 2 years

Your family may want you to have another baby. You could explain that your next baby will be healthier with a gap of at least 2 years.

If your mom had babies close together, she may not understand why you want to wait. Your partner may want another baby, too.

There are 3 reasons why it is better to wait.

•	Being pregnant before your baby is 2 years old can put you at risk. Your body needs to recover from the first birth.

•	Waiting 2 years keeps your next baby healthy, too. Getting pregnant too soon can mean that the next baby will be weak or premature.

•	Waiting gives you and your partner time to earn more money. You can use this money to save for the future. This will make it easier for you to pay for the things you need to keep you and your baby healthy. 

A brother or sister for your baby might be just what your family wants. But waiting until your baby is at least 2 years old will give you a healthier and happier family. And give you time to enjoy this baby.

If you have not started using a birth control method yet, now is the time. Talk to your healthcare provider. 

[Are you ready for another one?][1]



  [1]: http://www.babycenter.com/0_are-you-ready-for-another-one_7055.bc
